1580090.name: Galaxy ONE
1580090.description: Take to your space ship, boost off into space and defeat endless waves of enemy's in highly detailed and realistic space battles. With many intense space races and indoor races, on bikes or space crafts to complete against AI or friends in multiplayer. Once you get off your feet, how about trying to take over a enemy space station? It will be very challenging but worth it. Show off your dance moves to your friends, choose from many ships, or customise your own, with many of weapons to choose from for highly immersive classic first person shooter modes and more. Meet up with your friends at the Galactic Hub where there will be many interactions to try out. Or just roam around in space in your free time.
1580090.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
